data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Bastar, Chhattisgarh, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bastar, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Bastar who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 114 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Bastar, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Bastar, Chhattisgarh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 15,545 believers in Bastar to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Gond Muria people.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Bastar, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Bastar.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Bastar, Chhattisgarh, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
